H0.text: What tune do the bells of Big Ben chime. Westminster Quarters

H1.text: What tune do the bells of Big Ben chime. Oranges and Lemons

H2.text: What tune do the bells of Big Ben chime. God Save the Queen

H3.text: What tune do the bells of Big Ben chime. Four notes from Handel's ?Messiah?

A4.text: Along with the Great Bell, the belfry houses four quarter bells which play the Westminster Quarters on the quarter hours.

A5.text: The tune is that of the Cambridge Chimes, first used for the chimes of Great St Mary's church, Cambridge, and supposedly a variation, attributed to William Crotch, based on violin phrases from the air 'I know that my Redeemer liveth' in George Frideric Handel's Messiah.
